questions.question: Who asks the group who has slept with whom among the six friends?
questions.explanation: Janice asks the group the question at Central Perk.

questions.question: What does Joey claim happened between Monica and Rachel?
questions.explanation: Joey jokingly says that Monica and Rachel got together.

questions.question: What is the name of Carol's new friend that Ross mentions?
questions.explanation: Ross mentions that Carol met a woman named Susan at the gym.

questions.question: Why does Phoebe tell Monica she needs to move out?
options: Because Phoebe wants to live with her grandmother
Because Monica is too uptight and Phoebe needs to live in a place where she can spill things
questions.correct_answer: Because Monica is too uptight and Phoebe needs to live in a place where she can spill things
questions.explanation: Phoebe tells Monica that she needs to live in a place where she can be herself and not worry about making a mess.

questions.question: What is the profession of the potential roommate Eric?
questions.explanation: Chandler interviews Eric, who is a photographer, as a potential roommate.

questions.question: What does Joey think 'coming in for some lemonade' means?
questions.explanation: Joey misunderstands Monica's invitation to come in for lemonade and thinks it's an invitation for sex.

questions.question: Why does Ross think his marriage is over?
options: Because Carol is having an affair with another man
Because they have been married for too long
questions.explanation: Ross tells Phoebe that he thinks his marriage is over because Carol is a lesbian.

questions.question: What is the name of the woman Ross's wife Carol meets at the gym?
questions.explanation: Ross mentions that Carol met a woman named Susan at the gym.

questions.question: What does Rachel order to drink at the bar with her friends?
questions.explanation: Rachel orders a rum and Diet Coke at the bar with her friends.

questions.question: What does Chandler do when he meets Rachel at the bar at the end of the episode?
options: He talks to her about the weather
questions.explanation: Chandler kisses Rachel at the bar at the end of the episode.

questions.question: What is the name of the song that plays when Chandler and Rachel kiss at the bar?
questions.explanation: The song 'It's That Time of Season' plays when Chandler and Rachel kiss at the bar.

questions.question: Why does Phoebe move out of Monica's apartment?
options: Because Phoebe wants to live with her grandmother
Because Monica is too uptight and Phoebe needs to live in a place where she can spill things
questions.correct_answer: Because Monica is too uptight and Phoebe needs to live in a place where she can spill things
questions.explanation: Phoebe tells Monica that she needs to live in a place where she can be herself and not worry about making a mess.

questions.question: What does Joey do when he first meets Monica in the hallway?
options: He asks her out on a date
questions.explanation: Joey says hello to Monica when they first meet in the hallway.

questions.question: What is the name of the potential roommate who tells Chandler that his sister is a porn star?
questions.explanation: Eric tells Chandler that his sister is a porn star during their interview.

questions.question: What does Ross do when he finds out that his wife Carol is a lesbian?
options: He tries to convince her to stay in the marriage
questions.explanation: Ross kisses Phoebe after finding out that his wife Carol is a lesbian.

questions.question: What does Chandler say to Monica when she is feeling down about Phoebe moving out?
options: You're one of my favorite people and the most beautiful woman I've ever known in real life
questions.correct_answer: You're one of my favorite people and the most beautiful woman I've ever known in real life
questions.explanation: Chandler tries to comfort Monica by telling her that she is one of his favorite people and the most beautiful woman he's ever known.

questions.question: What is the reason for the flashback in the episode?
options: To show how the friends met
To show how Ross and Carol got married
To show how Phoebe and Monica became roommates
To show how Chandler and Joey became roommates
questions.correct_answer: To show how the friends met
questions.explanation: The flashback in the episode shows how the friends met and interacted in the past.

questions.question: What does Rachel want to do when she returns to the bar at the end of the episode?
options: She wants to talk to Chandler
She wants to order a drink
questions.explanation: Rachel wants to kiss Chandler when she returns to the bar at the end of the episode.

questions.question: What is the name of the bar where the friends hang out?
questions.explanation: The friends hang out at Central Perk throughout the episode.

questions.question: What does Phoebe do when Mr. Heckles complains about the noise?
options: She apologizes and promises to keep the noise down
She slams the door in his face
questions.correct_answer: She slams the door in his face
questions.explanation: Phoebe slams the door in Mr. Heckles' face when he complains about the noise.

questions.question: What is the reason for Ross's foot getting stuck in the pool table pocket?
options: He was trying to get a ball out
He was trying to get comfortable
He was trying to get a better view
He was trying to get away from Phoebe
questions.correct_answer: He was trying to get a ball out
questions.explanation: Ross's foot gets stuck in the pool table pocket when he tries to get a ball out.

questions.question: What does Joey say when he finds out that Ross's wife Carol is a lesbian?
questions.explanation: Joey says 'That's cool' when he finds out that Ross's wife Carol is a lesbian.

questions.question: What does Chandler do when he meets Rachel at the bar at the end of the episode?
options: He talks to her about the weather
questions.explanation: Chandler kisses Rachel at the bar at the end of the episode.

questions.question: What is the name of the song that plays during the opening credits?
questions.explanation: The song 'I'll Be There for You' plays during the opening credits of the episode.

questions.question: What does Monica say to Rachel when they meet at the bar?
options: I'm sorry I missed your engagement party
questions.explanation: Monica suggests having lunch with Rachel soon when they meet at the bar.

questions.question: What does Ross do when he finds out that his wife Carol is a lesbian?
options: He tries to convince her to stay in the marriage
questions.explanation: Ross kisses Phoebe after finding out that his wife Carol is a lesbian.

questions.question: What is the reason for the friends' conversation about who has slept with whom?
questions.explanation: Janice asks the friends who has slept with whom, starting the conversation.
